mapper.select: select * from (select nvl(count(store.store_num),0) as industryCount, cm.MAINCATEGORY_NAME as industryName from store, category_main cm where (dong_code = #{dong_code} and store.maincategory_code = cm.maincategory_code) group by cm.MAINCATEGORY_NAME order by 1 desc) where rownum <= 3

select * from (select nvl(count(store.middlecategory_code),0) as industryCount, cm.middlecategory_name as industryName from store, category_middle cm where (dong_code = #{dong_code} and store.middlecategory_code = cm.middlecategory_code) group by cm.middlecategory_name order by 1 desc) where rownum <=5
